topics.topic_html:
<sn><md class="p-1 p-md-2 my-2" data-rr="true">### **Vocabulary**
---

| Word           | Bengali Meaning             | Example Sentence                                                |
| -------------- | --------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------- |
| implicit       | সুপ্ত, পরোক্ষ               | The meaning was **implicit** in her words.                      |
| explicit       | স্পষ্ট, প্রকাশ্য            | He gave **explicit** instructions not to touch anything.        |
| coercion       | জোরপূর্বক বাধ্য করা         | They obtained the confession by **coercion**.                   |
| confess       | স্বীকার       | They obtained the confession by **coercion**.                   |
| harnessing     | নিয়ন্ত্রণ ও ব্যবহার         | Scientists are **harnessing** solar energy for power.           |
| under the hood | ভেতরের কার্যপ্রণালী         | The software looks simple, but it's complex **under the hood**. |
| furnish        | সরবরাহ করা                  | We will **furnish** the apartment before you move in.           |
| convey         | প্রকাশ করা, বোঝানো          | Please **convey** my regards to your parents.                   |
| conduct        | পরিচালনা করা                | She will **conduct** the meeting at 3 PM.                       |
| employ         | কাজে লাগানো, নিয়োগ করা      | He **employs** innovative methods in teaching.                  |
| imply          | ইঙ্গিত করা                  | Are you **implying** that I’m not qualified?                    |
| primitive      | আদিম, অপরিণত                | They used **primitive** tools for hunting.                      |
| surrogate      | বিকল্প                      | She is acting as a **surrogate** mother.                        |
| caution        | সতর্কতা                     | You should proceed with **caution** in this area.               |
| edge           | প্রান্ত, সুবিধা             | He has an **edge** over other candidates due to experience.     |
| statistics     | পরিসংখ্যান                  | The **statistics** show a steady rise in income.                |
| extract        | বের করা, আহরণ করা           | They managed to **extract** useful data from the research.      |
| inferred       | অনুমান করা হয়েছে            | From the evidence, it can be **inferred** that he was present.  |
| contemplate    | চিন্তা করা, ভাবা            | She sat quietly to **contemplate** her decision.                |
| reluctant      | অনিচ্ছুক                    | He seemed **reluctant** to join the discussion.                 |
| mumble         | বিড়বিড় করে বলা              | He **mumbled** something and left the room.                     |
| literary       | সাহিত্যিক                   | This is a **literary** masterpiece.                             |
| obscure        | অস্পষ্ট, অজানা              | His explanation was too **obscure** to understand.              |
| certain        | নিশ্চিত                     | I'm **certain** she will win the award.                         |
| critical       | গুরুত্বপূর্ণ / সমালোচনামূলক | He is in **critical** condition after the accident.             |
| novice         | নবীন, অনভিজ্ঞ               | She’s a **novice** at driving.                                  |
| solely         | কেবলমাত্র                   | This decision is **solely** his responsibility.                 |
| volatile       | অস্থির, পরিবর্তনশীল         | The stock market is highly **volatile**.                        |
| deficiency     | ঘাটতি, অভাব                 | Iron **deficiency** can cause fatigue.                          |
| hierarchy      | শ্রেণিবিন্যাস, স্তরভিত্তিক  | The corporate **hierarchy** is very rigid.                      |
| astonishingly  | আশ্চর্যজনকভাবে              | The task was **astonishingly** easy.                            |
| antique        | প্রাচীন, প্রাচীন নিদর্শন    | That vase is an **antique** from the 18th century.              |
| nostalgic      | স্মৃতিকাতর                  | The song made me feel **nostalgic** about my childhood.         |
| regardless     | উপেক্ষা করে, তবুও           | He went out **regardless** of the heavy rain.                   |



</md></sn>

<sn><md class="p-1 p-md-2 my-2" data-rr="true">### **Vocabulary**
---

| Word                 | Bengali Meaning          | Example Sentence                                                |
| -------------------- | ------------------------ | --------------------------------------------------------------- |
| arbitrary            | খেয়ালখুশিমত, ইচ্ছাধীন   | The decision seemed **arbitrary** and unfair.                   |
| brevity              | সংক্ষিপ্ততা              | The **brevity** of his speech impressed everyone.               |
| secrecy              | গোপনীয়তা                 | They planned the event in complete **secrecy**.                 |
| indecently           | অশালীনভাবে               | He was dressed **indecently** at the formal event.              |
| impulse              | আকস্মিক তাগিদ            | She bought the dress on an **impulse**.                         |
| marvelous            | চমৎকার, বিস্ময়কর         | The view from the top was absolutely **marvelous**.             |
| convenient           | সুবিধাজনক                | Online classes are **convenient** for busy people.              |
| correspond           | অনুরূপ  | Your story doesn't **correspond** with the facts.               |
| devised              | উদ্ভাবিত                 | They **devised** a new method to reduce waste.                  |
| visual               | দৃষ্টিনির্ভর, চাক্ষুষ    | The book includes **visual** aids to help learning.             |
| aural                | শ্রবণসংক্রান্ত           | Language learning should include **aural** practice.            |
| on closer inspection | ঘনিষ্ঠভাবে দেখলে         | **On closer inspection**, the painting revealed hidden details. |
| wheel of fortune     | ভাগ্যের চাকা             | Life turns like a **wheel of fortune**.                         |
| consecutive          | পরপর                     | He scored goals in three **consecutive** matches.               |
| combinatorial        | সমন্বয়সংক্রান্ত         | This problem involves **combinatorial** analysis.               |
| wound                | ক্ষত, আঘাত               | He had a deep **wound** on his arm.                             |
| doom                 | ধ্বংস, অনিবার্য বিপর্যয় | They felt a sense of **doom** before the storm.                 |
| rudimentary          | প্রাথমিক, মৌলিক          | He has only **rudimentary** knowledge of chemistry.             |
| sophisticated        | জটিল, উন্নত, সূক্ষ্ম     | The system is too **sophisticated** for beginners.              |
| transaction          | লেনদেন                   | The bank recorded every **transaction**.                        |
| decreed              | আদেশ জারি করা হয়েছে      | The king **decreed** a national holiday.                        |
| suspicious           | সন্দেহজনক                | The bag left on the bench looked **suspicious**.                |
| folk                 | লোকজন, লোকসংস্কৃতি       | I love listening to **folk** songs.                             |
| assemble             | একত্র করা                | They will **assemble** at the town hall.                        |
| re-assemble          | পুনরায় একত্র করা        | We had to **re-assemble** the parts after cleaning.             |
| sailor               | নাবিক                    | The **sailor** navigated through the storm.                     |
| captive              | বন্দি                    | The lion was held **captive** in a small cage.                  |
| drawback             | অসুবিধা, প্রতিবন্ধকতা    | The main **drawback** of the plan is the high cost.             |
| pitfall              | ফাঁদ, বিপদ               | Watch out for the common **pitfalls** of dieting.               |
| adequate             | যথেষ্ট                   | We have an **adequate** supply of food.                         |
| inadequate           | অপ্রতুল                  | His explanation was **inadequate** and unclear.                 |
| proficient           | দক্ষ                     | She is **proficient** in three languages.                       |
| intervention         | হস্তক্ষেপ                | Government **intervention** stopped the crisis.                 |
| obstacle             | বাধা                     | Fear is often the biggest **obstacle** to success.              |
| sightless            | দৃষ্টিহীন                | The **sightless** man walked with a cane.                       |





</md></sn>

<sn><md class="p-1 p-md-2 my-2" data-rr="true">### **Vocabulary**
---
| Word          | Bengali Meaning                   | Example Sentence                                            |
| ------------- | --------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------- |
| portrait      | প্রতিকৃতি, চিত্র                  | The artist painted a **portrait** of the queen.             |
| instantaneous | তাত্ক্ষণিক                        | The response was **instantaneous**.                         |
| stab          | ছুরি মারা, আঘাত করা               | He tried to **stab** the attacker in self-defense.          |
| transcribe    | লিখে নেওয়া, প্রতিলিপি করা        | She had to **transcribe** the interview for the report.     |
| ease          | স্বাচ্ছন্দ্য, সহজ করা             | Meditation helps to **ease** anxiety.                       |
| awkward       | বিশ্রী, অস্বস্তিকর                | There was an **awkward** silence in the room.               |
| seem          | মনে হওয়া, দেখাতে লাগা            | It does **seem** like a good idea.                          |
| medieval      | মধ্যযুগীয়                        | The castle has a **medieval** design.                       |
| contradiction | বিরোধ, পরস্পরবিরোধিতা             | His words were a **contradiction** of his actions.          |
| sought        | চাওয়া হয়েছিল, অন্বেষণ করা হয়েছিল | He **sought** advice from his mentor.                       |
| deduct        | বিয়োগ করা, কাটছাঁট করা           | You can **deduct** the cost from your salary.               |
| accustomate   | অভ্যস্ত করা                       | It took time to **accustomate** myself to the new schedule. |
| impediment    | প্রতিবন্ধকতা                      | Fear is a major **impediment** to growth.                   |
| persuade      | রাজি করানো                        | I tried to **persuade** him to join the event.              |
| abandon       | ত্যাগ করা                         | They had to **abandon** the mission halfway.                |
| relevance     | প্রাসঙ্গিকতা                      | His comment had no **relevance** to the topic.              |
| adapt         | খাপ খাওয়ানো                       | We must **adapt** to changing environments.                 |
| conceive      | ধারণা করা, কল্পনা করা             | It’s hard to **conceive** a world without the internet.     |
| inevitable    | অনিবার্য                          | Change is **inevitable** in life.                           |
| deduce        | সিদ্ধান্তে পৌঁছানো                | From the clues, we can **deduce** the truth.                |
| approximate   | আনুমানিক                          | The **approximate** cost of the project is \$5000.          |

</md></sn>

<sn><md class="p-1 p-md-2 my-2" data-rr="true">### **Vocabulary**
---

| Word           | Bengali Meaning          | Example Sentence                                               |
| -------------- | ------------------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------- |
| successive     | পরপর, ধারাবাহিক          | He won three **successive** matches.                           |
| conversely     | বিপরীতভাবে               | She loves math; **conversely**, her brother hates it.          |
| in general     | সাধারণভাবে               | **In general**, people prefer comfort over fashion.            |
| convenient     | সুবিধাজনক                | Morning is the most **convenient** time for me.                |
| criteria       | মানদণ্ড                  | You must meet all the **criteria** to qualify.                 |
| broaden        | প্রশস্ত করা              | Travel helps to **broaden** your perspective.                  |
| unambiguous    | স্পষ্ট, দ্ব্যর্থহীন      | His answer was clear and **unambiguous**.                      |
| irrelevant     | অপ্রাসঙ্গিক              | That comment is **irrelevant** to our discussion.              |
| omit           | বাদ দেওয়া                | Please don’t **omit** any details.                             |
| tedious        | ক্লান্তিকর, বিরক্তিকর    | The job is repetitive and **tedious**.                         |
| constraint     | সীমাবদ্ধতা               | Budget is the biggest **constraint** here.                     |
| composite      | যৌগিক, সংযুক্ত           | The material is a **composite** of plastic and metal.          |
| assimilate     | আত্মস্থ করা              | Immigrants often struggle to **assimilate** into new cultures. |
| digest         | হজম করা, আত্মস্থ করা     | It took time to **digest** the shocking news.                  |
| soak           | ভিজিয়ে দেওয়া             | Let the beans **soak** overnight.                              |
| absorb         | শোষণ করা                 | This cloth can **absorb** a lot of water.                      |
| excess         | অতিরিক্ত                 | **Excess** sugar is harmful to health.                         |
| seeps into     | ধীরে ধীরে ঢুকে পড়ে      | Water **seeps into** the ground after rain.                    |
| notion         | ধারণা                    | He has a strange **notion** about success.                     |
| discrete       | পৃথক, আলাদা              | The data is divided into **discrete** categories.              |
| succinct       | সংক্ষিপ্ত ও স্পষ্ট       | Her explanation was **succinct** and effective.                |
| ubiquitous     | সর্বব্যাপী               | Mobile phones have become **ubiquitous** in our lives.         |
| realm          | ক্ষেত্র, জগত             | He is famous in the **realm** of science fiction.              |
| beyond         | ছাড়িয়ে, বাইরে          | The truth is **beyond** our understanding.                     |
| propound       | প্রস্তাব করা             | He **propounded** a new theory in economics.                   |
| prior          | পূর্ববর্তী               | You need **prior** experience for this job.                    |
| allusion       | ইঙ্গিত, পরোক্ষ উল্লেখ    | The poem makes an **allusion** to mythology.                   |
| celestial      | আকাশীয়, দেবত্বসম্পর্কিত | A comet is a **celestial** body.                               |
| artifice       | কৌশল, চালাকি             | His story was just an **artifice** to gain sympathy.           |
| shallow        | অগভীর                    | The water is too **shallow** to swim.                          |
| porous         | ছিদ্রযুক্ত, ছাঁকনিযুক্ত  | Sponge is a **porous** material.                               |
| impermeable    | অপরিবাহী                 | The roof is made of **impermeable** material.                  |
| debris         | ধ্বংসাবশেষ               | After the blast, **debris** was scattered everywhere.          |
| erodes         | ক্ষয় করা                | Rain slowly **erodes** the hillside.                           |
| flash flood    | হঠাৎ প্লাবন              | A **flash flood** washed away the bridge.                      |
| mud            | কাদা                     | His shoes were covered in **mud**.                             |
| aforementioned | উল্লিখিত                 | The **aforementioned** problems need urgent attention.         |
| assert         | জোর দিয়ে বলা            | He **asserted** his innocence.                                 |
| affirmative    | সম্মতিপূর্ণ              | She gave an **affirmative** nod.                               |
| rot            | পচা                      | The fruit started to **rot** in the sun.                       |
| embed          | বসানো        | The journalist was **embedded** with the army unit.            |
| complement     | পরিপূরক                  | The wine **complements** the meal perfectly.                   |
| compliment     | প্রশংসা                  | He gave her a kind **compliment**.                             |
| advice         | পরামর্শ                  | I need your **advice** on this matter.                         |
| advise         | পরামর্শ দেওয়া            | I strongly **advise** you to reconsider.                       |
| proposition    | প্রস্তাব, মতবাদ          | They rejected his business **proposition**.                    |
| cane           | লাঠি                     | The old man walks with a **cane**.                             |



</md></sn>
